title: Virtual Assistant
job_overview:
I'm Susan — an ADHD parent coach and educator based in Perth, Australia. I work with incredible families raising children with ADHD, and I run an online business that includes courses, coaching, and community support.

I’m looking for a *high-level Virtual Assistant* who is:

* Smart and proactive (you don’t wait to be told every little step)
* Emotionally intelligent and kind (because this work is full of heart)
* A great communicator who can follow direction but also *run* with things
* Highly organised and detail-focused (especially when I’m not!)
* Tech-savvy and experienced (especially with **Kajabi** — please be an expert!)
* Interested in ADHD or open to learning more about it over time

This is for someone who *thrives in a supportive but fast-moving environment* and who wants to grow with a business that is making a genuine difference in the world.

Your role will include:

* Admin and inbox management
* Scheduling and calendar support
* Kajabi updates and backend (emails, landing pages, products, automations, uploads. SOP documentation)
* Basic marketing tasks (social media support, content uploads, repurposing)
* Helping me *stay on track* with business systems and timelines

I’ve worked with wonderful VAs before, and I believe in treating you with respect, being clear with expectations, and building a great working relationship over time.

This job is NOT for someone who:

* Needs to be micromanaged
* Disappears or goes quiet under pressure
* Isn’t confident learning new systems or asking questions

This job IS for someone who:

* Takes initiative
* Communicates clearly
* Cares about doing things well (not just done)
* Has a heart for helping others
